subtitle: At Capillarie Clinic we specialize in hair medicine and aesthetics.
subtitle2: Our team consists of specialists in aesthetic treatments and includes a specific department for hair surgery and transplantation.
text1: At Capillarie Clinic, we are a team of professionals highly trained in hair recovery procedures, as well as trained in the most modern hair implant surgery techniques.
text2:
We offer all solutions for hair treatments, for both men and women. 
Our knowledge and experience are at your entire disposal.
text3: The personal treatment and constant care towards our patients is a value that we have maintained over the years and that has allowed us to continue growing thanks to your trust.
